name: Hammad Khan
text: I, Hammad Khan, a dedicated frontend web developer, merges creativity with technical expertise. Proficient in HTML, CSS, bootstrap, responsive designs and JavaScript. A lifelong learner and problem solver.

name: Haider Zahoor
text: My name is Haider Zahoor, I am from Abbottabad Pakistan my passion is Graphic Design and I work on different types of design and done internship in graphic design + UI & UX form KPITB Codematics.

name: Zeeshan Habib
text: Bachelors in Software Engineering graduate with a strong foundation in software development principles. Proficient in Flutter app development, showcasing expertise in creating applications with a keen focus on user interface and experience design.

name: Zain ur Rehman
text: I am a Backend Developer professional responsible for designing implementing and maintaining the server-side of web applications. I focus on creating the logic and infrastructure that supports the functionality of websites and applications.

name: Hamza Zahid
text: Hello my self hamza zahid. my qualification is d.com. I am a freelancer. I am an expert in digital marketing. I have expertise in : Google ads, Facebook ads, Social media management, instagram ads, photoshop, logo designs.
